channel.title: How do you add shops on a 508,And how do i add ::master for all players

item.title: How do you add shops on a 508,And how do i add ::master for all players
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

what do you mean master for all players? Do you mean you want new players to have maxed skills?
your command could be shortened by using a for statement:

 if(cmd[0].equals("master")) {
     for (int i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
            p.skillLvl[i] = 99;
            p.skillXP[i] = 13036000;
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add shops on a 508,And how do i add ::master for all players

@Java4lulz wrote:

Just dirrect me somewhere? or you could tell me cause this 508â€™s pvp.with no shops file or anything

		}
if(cmd[0].equals("master")) {
        p.skillLvl[0] = 99;
        p.skillXP[0] = 13036000;
